text: Am I not free? Am I not an apostle? Have I not seen Jesus our Lord? Are you not my work in the Lord?

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> an <st data-num="652" class="">apostle</st> to <st data-num="243" class="">others</st>, at <st data-num="1065" class="">least</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> the <st data-num="4973">confirming sign</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="651" class="">apostleship</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="3778" class="">This</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="627" class="">defense</st> to those who <st data-num="350" class="">examine</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
Do we <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="1849" class="">right</st> to <st data-num="2068 4095">financial support</st>?<n id="1" />

Do we <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> the <st data-num="1849" class="">right</st> to the <st data-num="79" class="">company</st> of a <st data-num="4013" class="">believing</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="3062" class="">other</st> <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2962">Lord’s</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2786" class="">Cephas</st>?<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> do <st data-num="3441" class="">only</st> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3756 2192">lack</st> the <st data-num="1849" class="">right</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="2038" class="">work</st>?

<st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="4218">ever</st> <st data-num="4754">serves in the army</st> at <st data-num="2398" class="">his own</st> <st data-num="3800" class="">expense</st>? <st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="5452" class="">plants</st> a <st data-num="290" class="">vineyard</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="846">its</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st>? <st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="4165" class="">tends</st> a <st data-num="4167" class="">flock</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2068" class="">consume</st> its <st data-num="1051" class="">milk</st>?

Am I <st data-num="2980" class="">saying</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">these things</st> only <st data-num="2596">on the basis of</st> <st data-num="444">common sense</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> does the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2532">as well</st>?
For it is written in the law of Moses, “Do not muzzle an ox while it is treading out the grain.” God is not concerned here about oxen, is he?

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> is he not <st data-num="3843" class="">surely</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">speaking</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> benefit? It was <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> the one <st data-num="722" class="">plowing</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="248" class="">threshing</st> <st data-num="3784" class="">ought</st> to work <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> of <st data-num="3348">enjoying the harvest</st>.

<st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="4687" class="">sowed</st> <st data-num="4152">spiritual blessings</st> among <st data-num="4771">you</st>, is it too <st data-num="3173" class="">much</st> to <st data-num="2325" class="">reap</st> <st data-num="4559" class="">material things</st> from <st data-num="4771">you</st>?

If others receive this right from you, are we not more deserving?

But we have not made use of this right. Instead we endure everything so that we may not be a hindrance to the gospel of Christ.

<st data-num="3756">Don’t</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> those who <st data-num="2038" class="">serve</st> in the <st data-num="2413" class="">temple</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2068" class="">eat food</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2411" class="">temple</st>, and those who <st data-num="4332" class="">serve</st> at the <st data-num="2379" class="">altar</st> <st data-num="4829">receive a part</st> of the <st data-num="2379" class="">offerings</st>?

<st data-num="3779">In the same way</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="1299" class="">commanded</st> those who <st data-num="2605" class="">proclaim</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st> to <st data-num="2198" class="">receive</st> their <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="5530" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5530" class="">used</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">any</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> rights. <st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> I am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1125" class="">writing</st> <st data-num="3778">these things</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> something will be <st data-num="1096" class="">done</st> <st data-num="1722">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">In fact</st>, it would be <st data-num="2570 3123">better</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> to <st data-num="599" class="">die</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st>—<st data-num="3762">no one</st> will <st data-num="2758" class="">deprive</st> me of <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> reason for <st data-num="2745" class="">boasting</st>!<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> I <st data-num="2097" class="">preach the gospel</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="318" class="">reason</st> for <st data-num="2745" class="">boasting</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="1945" class="">compelled</st> to do this. <st data-num="3759" class="">Woe</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> I do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2097">preach the gospel</st>!

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> I <st data-num="4238" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1635" class="">voluntarily</st>, I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> a <st data-num="3408" class="">reward</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> I do it <st data-num="210" class="">unwillingly</st>, I am <st data-num="4100" class="">entrusted with</st> a <st data-num="3622">responsibility</st>.
What then is my reward? That when I preach the gospel I may offer the gospel free of charge, and so not make full use of my rights in the gospel.
For since I am free from all I can make myself a slave to all, in order to gain even more people.

To the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st> I <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="2453" class="">Jew</st> to <st data-num="2770" class="">gain</st> the <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>. To those <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> I became <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> one <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> (though I <st data-num="846">myself</st> <st data-num="1510">am</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>)<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="2770" class="">gain</st> those <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>.

To those <st data-num="459" class="">free from the law</st> I became <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> one <st data-num="459" class="">free from the law</st> (though I am <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="459" class="">free from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="459" class="">law</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1772">under the law</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ)</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2770" class="">gain</st> those <st data-num="459" class="">free from the law</st>.
To the weak I became weak in order to gain the weak. I have become all things to all people, so that by all means I may save some.
I do all these things because of the gospel, so that I can be a participant in it.
Do you not know that all the runners in a stadium compete, but only one receives the prize? So run to win.
Each competitor must exercise self-control in everything. They do it to receive a perishable crown, but we an imperishable one.
So I do not run uncertainly or box like one who hits only air.
Instead I subdue my body and make it my slave, so that after preaching to others I myself will not be disqualified.
